#include<stdio.h>
int count=0;
int eval(int x,int y);
int main()
{
     int x,y;
    while(scanf("%d %d", &x, &y)) {
       if(!x && !y) break;

        //scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
        int m=eval(x,y);

        if(m==1)
        {printf("1 carry operation.\n");
        }
        else if (m==0)
        {
            printf("No carry operation.\n");
        }
        else if (m>1)
        {
              printf("%d carry operations.\n",m);
        }
    }



    return 0;

}
int eval(int x,int y)
{
    count=0;
    int u,v;
    int check=0;
    int flag=1;
    while(flag==1)
    {

        if(x==0 && y==0)
        {
           flag=0;

        }
        else{
            u=x%10;
            v=y%10;
            x=x/10;
            y=y/10;
            if((u+v+check)>9)
            {
                //printf("\n%d\t%d\t%d\t\n",x,y,check);
                count++;
                check=1;
            }
        else{
                check=0;
            }
        }
    }
    return count;

}
